title: Cherry Magic! Thirty Years of Virginity Can Make You a Wizard?!
description: 30 year old Adachi Kiyoshi is a full office worker who recently got the power of reading people's mind. He accidently touches Kurosawa Yuichi, who is the best known handsome guy in the company and finds out that Yuichi is in love with Kiyoshi himself.
